full_text:
Using @nflfastR‘s EPA model and @buddavis’s ridge regression technique, we can create adjusted EPA/play for NFL teams. This effectively creates an “expectation” for performance against each team, which allows for “EPA/Play Over Expected” #nflverse

link: https://t.co/o1rUgwEK6T https://t.co/KYqkBxLbeH

Here a Fourth Down Summary with the dark column "go for it ratio" and with the light column "success ratio". 
Chargers has fourth success ratio and in the end..... the Patriots are still first.

P.S.Text with opportunities and attempts. Kneels are not counted. #nflverse https://t.co/q30bBPqPld
